name: Simply Solitaire (itch)
description:
If you are looking for a simple solitaire game to pass the time. Then look no further, this is your Simply Solitaire game.  It is also available for mobile.

  • Klondike draw 3
  • Double hit moves cards to top
  • Drag-and-drop to move cards
  • Game progress is saved
  • Unlimited undo
  • Win animation
